services.text: Choose type of material, finishing, and of course printing
services.label: Packaging Box
productDescriptionParagraphs: Packing your products, Packaging a delivery, or just organizing items, packaging boxes are used for anything, from cereal boxes to cosmetic products. It offers a level of customization to how the end product will present itself.

Getting the packaging box design right is a crucial step when it comes to public recognition. The box is the first thing that customers see when they receive products or gifts. Packaging boxes help in advertising tremendously as they not only please the current clients but may also catch an eye of any potential new comers.

additionalInfo.title: Check out some of our examples
Choose paper type
additionalInfo.titleDescription: Selecting a right paper type is crucial as it will be the body of the product.

additionalInfo.title: Select lamination
additionalInfo.titleDescription: Lamination provides an extra layer of proteciton making the products scratch and water resistant.

images.label: Matt Lamination
images.description: Matt Lamination is a layer of protective, transparent, matt film over the surface to give the product a non-glossy appearance. It comes at an affordable price, yet gives a great feel upon contact.

images.label: Gloss Lamination
images.description: Glossy Lamination is a clear layer of protective film over the surface of the product that brings up the colours of the item giving them a shiny appearance. It servers as a protective layer against scuffs, and scratches, and other alike types of damage.

images.label: Gloss Water Base Varnish
images.description: Glossy Water-Based Varnish specially designed for those who seek for a glossy, shiny look at an affordable price.

images.label: UV Varnish
images.description: UV Varnish is a layer of a glossy, liquid varnish cured under that undergoes a curing process under UV light that preservers the colours to stay shiny and vibrant.

additionalInfo.title: Finishing
additionalInfo.titleDescription: Elevate the appearance of your custom product by selecting one or more of the provided below attractive features.

images.label: Hot Stamp
images.description: An emblem made of a metallic foil is applied and hot-pressed on top of the product that provides a luxurious appearance. We provide a wide range of colours.

images.label: Spot UV
images.description: Spot UV is a clear-glossy finishing type that can be used to highlight the logo or an emblem on your product. It provides a different texture on a matt surface that results in difference if feel and appearance catching more attention.

images.label: Embossing
images.description: Embossing is a 3D pattern of your logo or text. It is achieved by pressing an image onto the surface of your product providing an elevated, 3D look to it.

images.label: Window Cutout
images.description: A Window Cutout is a custom cut area on your box. It provides a display/preview of the content inside, lets the potential clientele have an initial feel of your product and still maintains safety of it.

images.label: Window Patching
images.description: Window Patching is similar to Window Cutout but a transparent plastic film is used as a cover for the window. This provides more security to the content of the box by still allowing customers see what is inside.

services.text: Label sticker is the face of the product and can easily attract a lot of attention
services.label: Label Sticker
productDescriptionParagraphs: Label stickers help you instantly catch customers' eyes. A good label sticker makes your product stand out in on a shelf among other products and simply make your product speak for itself.
A good and informative label sticker can contain all the necessary important information, therefore clients may pass share it and popularize your product further.
A label sticker can be planced on almost any surface and can be of various sizes.
